attributes.action: put his faith in the good sense of the electorate to clean out the Augean Stable in a day and call an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is universal disgust at the current state of affairs regarding the claims of MPs and Peers, many of which have been shown to bring the British parliament into disrepute.  In order that this erosion of faith does not continue, every elected member should address his or her own constituents and allow them to offer their approval or disapproval as they see fit, thus closing the book on this sorry state of affairs and also saving the public purse a great deal of money in protracted enquiries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
